column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT LEESTOWN RD:
column4: The outer loop is shutdown just past the overpass until further notice.  Serious multi-vehicle injury collision.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT LEESTOWN RD:
column4: No access to outer loop New Circle Rd from Leestown Rd or Georgetown Rd.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT LEESTOWN RD:
column4: Traffic on the inner loop between Old Frankfort Pike and Leestown Rd is moving very slowly and may be stopped as needed by Police during the investigation.
Outbound Winchester Rd at Walton Ave
Leestown Rd between N Forbes Rd and Citation Blvd
column5: Motorists can expect heavier than normal congestion and long delays due to a serious collision on New Circle Rd at Leestown Rd.
